alert.note: Alert for Clay; West Becker; West Otter Tail (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 24 at 7:26PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Clay, northwestern Otter Tail and southwestern Becker Counties through 815 PM CDT... At 726 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a landspout over Rollag, or 16 miles west of Detroit Lakes, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts, winds in excess of 40 mph, and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Hawley, Lake Park, Hitterdal, Cormorant, Dale and Rollag. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for northwestern and west central Minnesota.

area.areaDesc: Clay; West Becker; West Otter Tail
